Title: ASP.NET, TinyMCE integration with  asp.net image browser plugin
Description:
Although integrating the tinyMCE wysywig control into an asp.net page is relatively easy, it doesn't have a working upload image plugin. 

For some strange reason, the advimage plugin doesn't have an upload image button.

To resolve this, I created my own asp.net upload image manager plugin. (aspnetbrowser)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Although integrating the tinyMCE wysywig control into an asp.net page is relatively easy, it doesn't have a working upload image plugin.

To resolve this, I created my own asp.net upload image manager plugin. (aspnetbrowser)
